About this project

This project was a github repo that was cloned and refactored using Typescript and Redux to manage the state globably for the App. The inspiration for the project came while reading React documentation. Some challenges I had to overcome was understanding React's useEffect hook to re-render, together with Socket.io event-based architecture, at the correct time. Another challenge was learning to use Material-ui globably to get styles across different components and improve reuse.

Technical Sheet

Core technologies I used to build this project:

  • React
  • Node.JS
  • Express
  • Sockets.io
  • Material-UI
  • JSS
